artist: Artist: Edward Ruscha; Author: Edward Ruscha; Publisher: Multiples, Inc., New York
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
description:
Book contains 22 photographic illustrations; 52 pp. Book bound with pink satin ribbon, threaded through two holes and tied in bow on front cover. Title in green flocking on robin's egg blue cover. 

This copy: First and only edition.
markings: Stamped number [17857] in black ink on last page.
title: Babycakes with Weights
